title: skin preview banneble
body:
Can you use skin preview without getting banned?
Is using skin preview banneble?

replies.body: We don't support any third party programs or mods, and while we aren't suspending accounts using skin previews now that can change in the future.  Also keep in mind that we wouldn't be able to provide any support if something went wrong technically or if there is malicious content hidden inside those apps.  Check ou[r stance here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and keep wary!
Thanks rito, also for the quick reply
